alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 10:51AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI... SOUTHEASTERN PEMISCOT...DYER AND NORTH CENTRAL LAUDERDALE COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 AM CST... At 1051 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Heloise, or 13 miles south of Caruthersville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Newbern, Bradleytown, Heloise, Unionville, Miston, Lenox, Bishop, Ayers, Papaw Ridge, Porter Gap, Fowlkes, Bonicord, Jenkinsville, Maxey, Rohoboth, Tiger Tail, Broadmoor, South Fork, and Poplar Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
